metadata.title: CVE-2018-6412 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description:
In the function sbusfb_ioctl_helper() in drivers/video/fbdev/sbuslib.c inthe Linux kernel through 4.15, an integer signedness error allows arbitraryinformation leakage for the FBIOPUTCMAP_SPARC and FBIOGETCMAP_SPARCcommands.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-6412` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1023-azure - 4.15.0-1023.24
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux-azure package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1023.24').
